welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Hazebrouck! This charming city is known for its picturesque landscapes and rich history. We invite you to explore and experience all that Hazebrouck has to offer."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal serving regional and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Lesquin Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Terminal 2 is used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Kortrijk Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Kortrijk Airport is used for the transportation of goods and packages.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Calais Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Calais Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
